author: National Geographic
description:
What happens when a wild penguin takes on the city? Follow the remarkable journey of one brave South African penguin as he waddles through traffic, sidewalks, and city life—all to reunite with his family. Narrated by Blake Lively, this moment from Secrets of the Penguins showcases the intelligence, resilience, and heart of these incredible birds, as captured by National Geographic Explorer Bertie Gregory.

Secrets of the Penguins is now streaming on @disneyplus and @hulu: https://on.natgeo.com/4cHzyFv
